pages.text: It has been discovered that with the aid of the brewing cauldron and some not-so-rare components, chalk can be created. This item, which allows for the drawing of various symbols on different surfaces, paves the way into the realm of more advanced magical concepts, such as infusions or ritual magic. White chalk is a fundamental creation that every practitioner must master.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: The recipe for brewing chalk is not complicated and employs components that any self-respecting practitioner should already be proficient in acquiring.
